text: Kokshetau International Airport , formerly known as Kokchetav Airport or Kokshetau Airport () is an international airport. It is located in Kazakhstan 12.5 km northeast of Kokshetau, near the village of Akkol. ==References== Category:Airports in Asia Category:1945 establishments in Asia Category:Buildings and structures in Kazakhstan Category:20th-century establishments in Kazakhstan Category:Akmola Region
title: Kokshetau Airport
